speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0087/2007 ) by Markus Pieper, on behalf of the Committee on Regional Development, on the consequences of future enlargements on the effectiveness of cohesion policy ( 2006/2107(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0087/2007 ) by Markus Pieper, on behalf of the Committee on Regional Development, on the consequences of future enlargements on the effectiveness of cohesion policy ( 2006/2107(INI) ).
